name: elpwi2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cpw(c1))
-| wss(c0, c1)
-| wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cpw(c1))
-| wss(c0, c1)
-| wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1))
-| wcel(c1, c2)
-| wi(wcel(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cpw(c1))
-| wss(c0, c1)
-| wcel(c1, c2)
-| wi(wcel(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cpw(c1))
-| wss(c0, c1)
-| wcel(c1, c2)

comment: Membership in a power class. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
